DESCRIPTION: In this #yStance, your attacks deal half damage and are played twice.
In this #yStance, defeating an enemy heals you for 7.
In this #yStance, enemies who deal 10+ unblocked damage in one hit lose their next action.
Draw the topmost qualifying card from your draw pile. Doesn't shuffle.
At the end of your turn, take damage.
For one turn, you can't lose more HP than indicated.
